pullRequest.title: Sync cloud 3.3
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description

Motivation and Context


How Has This Been Tested?



Screenshots (if appropriate):
Types of changes


 Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
 New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
 Refactoring (non-breaking change)
 Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to change)

Checklist:



 My code follows the code style of this project.
 My change requires a change to the documentation.
 I have updated the documentation accordingly.
 I have read the CONTRIBUTING document.
 I have added tests to cover my changes.

commit.message:
Hide indices on cloud (#9423)

* hide indices page component in cloud

* abstract conditional away to component

* hide indices menu item on cloud

* hide indices failures

* rename jsx

* update mocks for settings

* hide index pages

* do not register indices routes

* disable indexes pages

* remove withHideOnCloud HOCs

* whoops, typo

* fix eslint and group routes to hide on cloud

(cherry picked from commit 67f840e365eae5d0a9350efa01f656f2d4ea6d8a)

hide es cluster info and system jobs (#9498)

(cherry picked from commit 9f8417de7b2c5d8bedb75727bcbc16ed594c2b81)

Hide outputs page on cloud (#9439)

* hide indices page component in cloud

* abstract conditional away to component

* hide indices menu item on cloud

* hide indices failures

* rename jsx

* update mocks for settings

* hide index pages

* hide outputs in systems menu

* hide output page

* do not register indices routes

* disable indexes pages

* remove withHideOnCloud HOCs

* whoops, typo

* use other method of hiding

* fix eslint and group routes to hide on cloud

* prevent streams/id/outputs to be loaded

* hide manage outputs on streams page

* hide stream index set select

* Stupid Gaya leaving test code in

Co-authored-by: Edmundo Alvarez <edmundo@graylog.com>

Co-authored-by: Edmundo Alvarez <edmundo@graylog.com>
(cherry picked from commit 8d1fc3efe595eecdc688031d0eabce3994d82b61)

nodes.bodyText: These routes are missing the exact prop they had in 4.0. I'm not sure if that was intended or something lost while cherry-picking the changes.

commit.message: hide manage outputs in streams context menu

Hide inputs and related on cloud (#9537)

* hide inputs in system menu

* disable the page

* hide management links on node inputs

* disable node input pages

* hide link to input page in notifications

* disable extractor pages

* hide other systems input link in notifications

* simplify filterMenuItems

* filter value actions to disallow extractor creation

* fix test mocks

(cherry picked from commit 828010c3e66e95f10dde4fe775c52bfe6d31c04a)
